CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES.

The I-CONECT research study is exploring how social conversation can help improve memory and may prevent dementia in older adults.

Research shows that remaining socially active later in life can have a positive impact on memory and mental function. I-CONECT is exploring how social conversation can help improve memory and may prevent dementia or Alzheimerâ€™s disease in older adults. In this study, participants connect with the research team using senior-friendly technology for fun and engaging conversations in the comfort of their own home. We are currently enrolling volunteers aged 75 and older.
